headline: Citi starts coverage of these ’safe haven’ food distributor stocks
summary: Investing.com -- Citi initiated coverage on U.S. food distributors, calling the group a “relatively safe haven for macro and tariff concerns” and issuing Buy ratings on Performance Food Group (NYSE:PFGC) and US Foods. Sysco (NYSE:SYY) received a Neutral rating.
